txt.en: 'Woad and orchanet! How thoughtful of you to bring these to us, [placeholder].'
The orchanet and woad you collected can be brought to Nethúr in Esteldín.
Collected hillborn woad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected hillborn orchanet ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Rangers of Esteldín are in need of supplies.
Collected hillborn woad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'The Rangers of Esteldín have always kept woad and orchanet close at hand for the dyeing of banners, and I passed much on my way here. Sadly, it would not be practical to bring these on my scouting mission.\n\n'If you pick some for Esteldín, they will be most pleased.'
Collected hillborn orchanet ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Hillborn woad and hillborn orchanet grow on the hills of eastern Nan Amlug and Rhunenlad.\n\nFaronwen has asked you to bring her some hillborn woad and hillborn orchanet, with which she will prepare dyes to colour the banners the Rangers will bear into battle.

'These shall do nicely. Thank you, [placeholder]. It may seem strange, but the colour of our symbol is most easily achieved by the use of these two plants.\n\n'Aragorn will be pleased when the banner is raised once more. We have hid here in Esteldín for too long.'
Collect hillborn woad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Our banners will fly high, and the Enemy will quail before them.'

'We are fortunate that the Orcs did not trample all of the vegetation. The plants that survived should be found on the hills east of Esteldín in Nan Amlug and Rhunenlad, though I do not know how plentiful they will be.'
'Your aid has been greatly appreciated, [placeholder].'
Collect hillborn orchanet ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the woad and orchanet back to Faronwen
Collect hillborn woad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect hillborn orchanet ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the dye-plants to Nethúr in Esteldín
A Symbol of Hope
Hillborn woad and hillborn orchanet grow on the hills of eastern Nan Amlug and Rhunenlad.\n\nElúr has asked you to collect some hillborn woad and hillborn orchanet for Esteldín.
